title: [UWP] Need http proxy function
body:
While http proxy function lost since windows phone,
Now in UWP we can only set http proxy(ip+port,username+psw) in the connected Wifi manually.

comments.body: In my application, a website in Russia is blocked. Not every user will be able to independently configure the proxy connection.

There are many web sites, that is blocked in Russia.
And if my app use content of this sites, proxy is needed.
System proxy for one app is overhead for user.

In my application, A website is blocked in China, and thus we need to use proxy to get resource from the blocked site. It's complex for user to set proxy over the block, and if set system proxy, some domestic sites are blocked for IP outside China.
Thus we need to set custom proxy to get access to the resource and not disturbing the user.

This idea tracks allowing apps to set a custom system proxy for specific HTTP requests. Today, in the UWP platform, the system proxy gets used by default and apps have the option of not going through the proxy.
Some business app need access enterprise intranet network outside company ( e.g. At Home)
